l:dependency.name: Jobcopy Builder plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Jenkins plugin to copy a job in a build step.

l:dependency.name: Hamcrest Core
l:dependency.l:description: This is the core API of hamcrest matcher framework to be used by third-party framework providers. This includes the a foundation set of matcher implementations for common operations.

l:dependency.name: JUnit
l:dependency.l:description: JUnit is a regression testing framework written by Erich Gamma and Kent Beck. It is used by the developer who implements unit tests in Java.
